name: Chomper
text: Chomper survives the sewers by snacking on smaller minions.

name: Awilo, Cooking Trainer
text: This chef is cooking up some REALLY healthy food.

name: The Great Akazamzarak
text: It's not real magic. He's got cards tucked into his sleeve.

name: Kaye Toogie
text: Step 1: Open portal. Step 2: Minions fight. Step 3: ...Victory?

name: The Amazing Bonepaw
text: What's amazing is how far he's gotten copying other people's spells.

name: Dazzik Hellscream
text: Something about the Warchief seems a little... off.

name: Flight Master Belnaara
text: When it comes to Fight or Flight, Belnaara chooses both.

name: Applebough
text: This old tree is full of knowledge to drop.

name: Archivist Oshi
text: Those who forget history are doomed to resummon it.

name: Mo Eniwhiskers
text: Mo's money creates Mo's problems.

name: Noz Timbertail
text: This kobold pirate has elevated sneak attacks to an art form.

name: Cravitz Lorent
text: Your battle with this romance novelist won't have a happy ending.

name: Albin Eastoft
text: Friend? Foe? He's on a beastial rampage, he's not particular.

name: Tierra Blythe
text: Be sure to tip your wait staff! (Or else.)

name: Moon Priestess Nici
text: Time heals all wounds. But if you're in a hurry, call Nici!

name: Alchemist Wendy
text: This alchemist mixes up decks, attempting to create golden cards.

name: Tala Stonerage
text: Druids walk many paths. Tala walks them all.

name: Disidra Stormglory
text: Terribly tenacious. Truly thaumaturgic. Totally totemic.

name: Linzi Redgrin
text: This teeny-tiny rogue dishes out some big big hurt.

name: Vas'no
text: This troll water shaman is into undertows and overloads.

name: Whirt the All-Knowing
text: What's the secret to knowing all secrets? It's a secret.

name: Bookmaster Bae Chao
text: Quiet, please.

name: Sharky McFin
text: This McShark feeds on the McWeak.

name: Ranger Ar'ha
text: Battlecry havoc, and let slip the Alleycats of war!

name: Jepetto Joybuzz
text: Some assembly required.

name: Dalaran Fountain Golem
text: Ice cold this fountain flows frostin' up foes with lyrical ice floes.

name: Rasil Fireborne
text: Some say art is subjective. Rasil prefers destructive.

name: Xur'ios
text: Master of spellcasting. [x]Lousy at spell-aiming.

name: Mama Diggs
text: She's always digging into her deck for elementals.

name: The Rat King
text: There must always be a rat king.

name: Timothy Jones
text: Timothy has never dusted a golden. Not even once!

name: Kizi Copperclip
text: A skilled stylist, but get on her bad side and she's a bit snippy.

name: Gold Elemental
text: Something has gone awry at the bottom of the wishing well.

name: Carousel Gryphon
text: Round and round your minions go...

name: Soothsayer Zoie
text: This healer will fight for her city. Break out the sooths!

name: Draemus
text: Importer of rare and exotic pets. Many of them dangerous.

name: Ol' Toomba
text: His hunt for treasure consumed his life... and maybe yours too.

name: Tipsi Wobblerune
text: She's a portable portal party!

name: Aki the Brilliant
text: Handbuffing isn't particularly brilliant but the name stuck.

name: Oxana Demonslay
text: Slaying demons is her profession, but beating you is her passion.

name: Ungan Oddkind
text: He conjures up animals. And insults. And insulting animals.

name: P.O.G.O.
text: This bionic bouncing machine has gone completely rogue!

name: Magistrix Norroa
text: There's no time to read her card text. Go, go, GO!

name: Erekem
text: This Arakkoa can see the future... and he's stacking the deck.

name: Moragg
text: "Prisoner #54293. Indefinite suspension. Avoid eye contact."

name: Ichoron
text: This elemental is double the trouble and triple the bubble.

name: Lavanthor
text: "What's in your mouth Lavanthor? Spit it out! Bad core hound!"

name: Zuramat the Obliterator
text: Imprisoned because the Kirin-Tor mostly frowns on obliterations.

name: Cyanigosa
text: This master of chaotic magic was the chosen agent of Malygos.

name: Nozari
text: When time travel fails, bronze dragons often resort to random sand.

name: Millificent Manastorm
text: Dread spouse of Millhouse, whom she'd like to have a word with.

name: Lieutenant Sinclari
text: She told them the Hold needed more security. She told them!

name: Dancin' Deryl
text: Can't stop, won't stop, the boogie woogie!

name: Locksmith Zibb
text: Mages in Dalaran rely on Zibb's skills to lock up their spells.

name: Captain Hannigan
text: Guards! GUARDS!!

name: Queen Wagtoggle
text: The kobold Queen is ALSO robbing the bank. And your minions.

name: Trade Prince Gallywix
text: The goblin Prince has rigged the market. Against you.

name: Boommaster Flark
text: Former Boom protégé, Flark has a blast messing with minions.

name: Madam Goya
text: "Extortion" is such an ugly word. Goya prefers "Licensing Fees."

name: Archmage Khadgar
text: Ingenuous. Inscrutable. Indefatigable. In... your... way.

name: Sael'orn
text: Traps prey like a spider... toys with them like a demon.

name: Haro Setting-Sun
text: With one hoof in the shadows, weakness is his strength.

name: Dagg Cruelmight
text: You never kick a man when he's down. Unless you're Dagg.

name: Banker Biggs
text: His minions are compound-interesting.

name: Valdera Highborne
text: His smile is disarming, but his fancy armor is the real threat.

name: Marei Loom
text: She'll exploit your finances, but she won't finance your exploits.

name: Archmage Vargoth
text: Trapped for years in Outland, Vargoth found new sources of magic.

name: Lilayell Suntear
text: She makes the instability of the universe work for her.

name: Archmage Kalec
text: It's just a matter of time before he's the next Malygos.

name: Sky Captain Smiggs
text: The only thing bigger than his moustache is his broadside.

name: Anarii Duskgrove
text: This druid speaks for the trees, and they have nothing nice to say.

name: Kazamon Steelskin
text: To say he's reckless is an understatement. Zero recks are given.

name: Hesutu Stonewind
text: This shaman has a way of whipping his minions into a frenzy.

name: Kara Stamper
text: She would sell a soul for more minions. Not hers, of course.

name: Commander Bolan
text: Be careful, he's got an enormous exclamation point over his head.

text: Chomper survives the sewers by snacking on smaller minions.
